long_description: The Marmot Hitch pack fits your kid's small body and big schedule, comfortably handling load-hauling duty for athletics, academics or an adventure on the trail. Adjustable, ergonomic shoulder straps and sternum strap maximize fit and comfort. Panel-loading main compartment opens wide for easy packing and access. Secondary zippered pocket contains an organizer for accessories. The Marmot Hitch pack features stretchy mesh water-bottle pockets and reflective accents. Sized to fit most kids ages 6 - 10 years.
short_description: The Marmot Hitch pack fits your kid's small body and big schedule, comfortably handling load-hauling duty for athletics, academics or an adventure on the trail.
